title.rendered: Best Celebrity Lash Extensions – BEAUTY NEWS

content.rendered:
BEST CELEBRITY LASH EXTENSIONS

I’m super excited to announce that my new D’Lashes “Lash Facials” are coming very soon! It’s basically everything eyes, eyes, and more eyes….it’s all about the eyes! 
 
The Lash Facial is a Deep Cleansing hydrating express facial along with your touchup or full Set. It comes with a hydrating deep penetrating mask. It’s the first of its kind and I created it for my top clients. 
  
Talk about a big year for our celebrity lashette! My beautiful client Sandra Oh has been named “The 100 Most Influential People” by TIME magazine. I’m so happy and excited for her! Congratulations Sandra!
 
Try out the new cryo facial for tighter and smoother looking skin at joinbeautycult.com. I love my results so much, and they also do botox and fillers. 
 
LOVE DIONNE
